articles.title: North side sends telephone message to south side
articles.content:
North side sends telephone message to south side 
    Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Jang Jae On, chairman of the central committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society, has been authorized today to send the south side a telephone message as regards the holding of a preparatory contact to discuss working procedural matters related to a historic inter-Korean Pyongyang meeting and summit talks in the portion of the south side at Panmunjom at 10:00 a.m. on April 22 (Saturday) at the request from the south side.
